forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 61. West wind 16 to 24 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 53. West southwest wind 14 to 24 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph.

weather_report:
A gentle breeze moves through Downtown San Francisco this morning, whispering promises of a mostly sunny day ahead. The high will flirt with the low sixties, defining a pleasantly mild atmosphere that beckons you outdoors. Although the sun is making its presence felt, the city retains that characteristic coolness of coastal mornings, with the marine layer still clinging to the edges of the landscape, telling tales of fog that may retreat as the sun climbs higher. Expect occasional breezy gusts that add a refreshing touch, but do not be surprised if some corners remain wrapped in a soft gray.

As the day unfolds, consider dressing in layers, perhaps a light sweater with a stylish jacket. Comfortable shoes will serve you well on a leisurely walk, taking time to explore the local cafés that thrive on the aromas of freshly brewed coffee and baked goods. Enjoying the view from Twin Peaks or taking a stroll through the less-trodden paths of the Presidio could lead to unexpected moments of serenity, while the vibrant energy of the city hums in the background. Embrace the day; it is a canvas painted in mild hues, waiting for you to add your touch.
